org.apache.xmlrpc

Class XmlRpc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.HandlerBase
      • org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler

    public abstract class XmlRpc
extends HandlerBase
    This abstract base class provides basic capabilities for XML-RPC, like parsing of parameters or encoding Java objects into XML-RPC format. XmlRpcServer and XmlRpcClient are the classes that actually implement an XML-RCP server and client.
    Author:
    Hannes Wallnoefer, Daniel Rall
    See Also:
    XmlRpcServer, XmlRpcClient
